content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦災孤児・・・可哀想、悲惨ー","translatedEnglishLine":"War orphans... So pitiful, tragic—"},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵に捕まった女騎士・・きゃーきゃー悲惨","translatedEnglishLine":"A female knight captured by the enemy... Eek eek, how tragic"},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、捕虜にした女の子を拷問、拷問ー","translatedEnglishLine":"And then, torturing the captured girls, torturing—"},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"いやーん、許してーというのを剥く　ひでーひでーそれ","translatedEnglishLine":"Nooo, please forgive me—stripping them off, that's terrible, just terrible"},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"命が欲しければスカート自分でめくってみなとか　ひでーよ、残酷ー","translatedEnglishLine":"If you want to live, lift up your own skirt or else—so cruel, so brutal"},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふむ、戦争は楽しそうだ。我々も参加せねばな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, war sounds like fun. We must participate as well."},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間の女の子を不幸にして不幸にして、それからちょっぴり救うのだー","translatedEnglishLine":"Make human girls unhappy and miserable, and then save them a little bit—"},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"おー　おー","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh— Oh—"},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハニーキングの側にはハニーの氷溶の者がいます（ウルザの信奉者）","translatedEnglishLine":"Beside the Honey King stands one of Honey’s Ice Melt followers (a devotee of Urza)."},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼は何か手紙を持っていますが、ハニーキングにそれはなんだと言うれると","translatedEnglishLine":"He carries a letter, but when the Honey King asks what it is,"},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"とある可憐な女性からハニーキング様へのラブレターです。","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s a love letter to the Honey King from a certain lovely lady."},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"でも、渡すタイミングは連絡が来た時という事になっていますので、今は渡せません","translatedEnglishLine":"However, the timing to deliver it is only when contact is made, so I cannot hand it over now."},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"えー、みたいなぁ・・でも、そうか、残念　待つか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Ehh, I want to see it... But I guess it’s too bad. I’ll wait..."},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時、そのハニーが持っていたブザーが何か通信関係がなる","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, the buzzer the Honey had starts ringing—some sort of communication."},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、連絡が来ました。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, a message has arrived."},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"今、お渡ししろとの事です・・どうぞ、これを","translatedEnglishLine":"They say to give it now... Here, please take this."},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が道を進んでいると・・","translatedEnglishLine":"As Rance and the others proceed down the road..."},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"木に登って周囲を偵察していたかなみが報告","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami, who was scouting around from a tree, reports."},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"向こうに煙りが見える・・さっきの町の方角だわ","translatedEnglishLine":"I see smoke over there... It’s in the direction of the town we just passed."},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"知能試験の合格者が集められていた町か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The town where the successful candidates of the intelligence test were gathered..."},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"何があった・・戻ってみよう","translatedEnglishLine":"What happened... Let’s go back and check."},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"町に戻る・・燃えていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Returning to the town... it was on fire."},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍が町を包囲するように現れ、住民を殺している","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army appeared surrounding the town, killing the residents."},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"知能試験で集められた住人は、何故だ・・俺達は試験に合格したエリートなんだろ","translatedEnglishLine":"The residents gathered for the intelligence test—why? We are supposed to be elites who passed the exam."},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前達、魔軍の何か手伝いをさせる為に集められたのではないのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Weren’t you gathered to be made to help the demon army somehow?"},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍ポル（ポルポトイメージ、ツォトンの側近）","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon General Pol (modeled after Pol Pot, Tsoton’s aide)"},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"　理由の説明","translatedEnglishLine":"    Explanation of the reason"},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ツォトンは人間共を家畜として管理する","translatedEnglishLine":"Tsoton manages humans as livestock."},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無闇には殺さない、労働力として必要だからな","translatedEnglishLine":"He doesn't kill them recklessly because he needs them as labor."},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、お前らのような頭のいい連中はいらない、インテリぶっていろいろ考え","translatedEnglishLine":"But he doesn’t need smart people like you, who act intellectual and overthink things."},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"　支配者に逆らう事ばかりをする、だからお前らは集めて殺す","translatedEnglishLine":"You always rebel against your rulers, so he gathers people like you to kill you."},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バカで従順な連中を残し、彼らを交配させバカな人間共をいっぱい作り支配する","translatedEnglishLine":"He leaves behind stupid and obedient ones, breeds them to create lots of dumb humans and rules them."},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっとかしこかった自分を怨むのだな","translatedEnglishLine":"You should curse your own slight intelligence."},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"と次々と殺されている所にランス達が現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Just as they are being killed one after another, Rance and the others appear."},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとかポルを倒した、魔物兵は逃げて行ったが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow defeated Pol; the demon soldiers fled..."},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"町は死体の山だった、数千人は集められていたはずだが・・生き残ったのは数百ぐらい","translatedEnglishLine":"The town was a mountain of corpses; thousands had been gathered, but only a few hundred survived."},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"むごい・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Cruel..."},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"頭のいい連中だけを殺して人間を家畜化するというのか・・むかつく","translatedEnglishLine":"They kill only the smart ones and turn humans into livestock... disgusting."},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"ああ、間違っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, that’s wrong."},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"もし間引く必要があるのなら、男とブスにしておけ","translatedEnglishLine":"If thinning out is necessary, then keep the men and ugly ones."},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"可愛い子はアホでも天才でも殺してはいけない","translatedEnglishLine":"Cute girls must never be killed, whether idiots or geniuses."},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっとランス、こんな時に不真面目な事を言わない","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, Rance, don’t say joking things at a time like this."},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・あっ、となるとウルザちゃんが危ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"...Ah, that means Urza-chan is in danger."},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"くそっ、どこだ、生きている魔物兵をとっつかまえて情報を吐かせるんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Damn it, where are they? Catch a living demon soldier and make it spill information."},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが・・魔物大将軍ツォトンの居場所は分からなかった","translatedEnglishLine":"But... we couldn’t find the location of Demon General Tsoton."},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・ううう","translatedEnglishLine":"...Uuuu..."},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"イライラしているランス、シィルがなだめている・・","translatedEnglishLine":"An irritated Rance is being calmed down by Seeral..."},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"きっと大丈夫ですよ、町の人が言っていだしゃないですか","translatedEnglishLine":"It will surely be alright, didn’t the townspeople say so?"},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"上級試験の合格者は魔軍司令部に連れていかれて、魔物大将軍ツォトンに謁見出来るとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who pass the advanced exam are taken to the demon army headquarters and can have an audience with Demon General Tsoton."},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍の頭脳にされるのかとは思いますが、命は無事なはずです","translatedEnglishLine":"I think they might be made the mind of the demon general, but their lives should be safe."},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや・・わからん","translatedEnglishLine":"No... I don't know."},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"この作戦だが、ウルザちゃんに危険は少しあるのは覚悟していた","translatedEnglishLine":"About this operation, I was prepared for there to be some danger to Urza-chan."},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"裸に剥かれて魔物将軍の頭脳にされる為にカプセルに入れられちゃうかもとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe she’ll be stripped naked and put in a capsule to be turned into the demon general’s mind."},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、奴らの目的は頭のいい者の処刑","translatedEnglishLine":"However, their goal is to execute the smart ones."},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"これはやばい、殺されてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"This is bad, she might be killed."},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに・・飛んでいるアニスにかかえられた千鶴子がやってくる、ウルザから連絡がきたわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then... Chizuko, carried by flying Anis, arrives. They've received contact from Urza."},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼女、計画通り、魔物大将軍ツォトンの元についたようよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"She seems to have reached Demon General Tsoton as planned."},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"座標はＸＸＸ、ＸＸＸ　ＸＸＸのＸＸＸのあたりよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"The coordinates are XXX, XXX, around XXX of XXX."},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな数字言われてもわからん","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if you say numbers like that, I don’t understand."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦災孤児・・・可哀想、悲惨ー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: War orphans... So pitiful, tragic—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵に捕まった女騎士・・きゃーきゃー悲惨
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A female knight captured by the enemy... Eek eek, how tragic

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、捕虜にした女の子を拷問、拷問ー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then, torturing the captured girls, torturing—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやーん、許してーというのを剥く　ひでーひでーそれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nooo, please forgive me—stripping them off, that's terrible, just terrible

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命が欲しければスカート自分でめくってみなとか　ひでーよ、残酷ー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to live, lift up your own skirt or else—so cruel, so brutal

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ、戦争は楽しそうだ。我々も参加せねばな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, war sounds like fun. We must participate as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間の女の子を不幸にして不幸にして、それからちょっぴり救うのだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make human girls unhappy and miserable, and then save them a little bit—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おー　おー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh— Oh—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキングの側にはハニーの氷溶の者がいます（ウルザの信奉者）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Beside the Honey King stands one of Honey’s Ice Melt followers (a devotee of Urza).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼は何か手紙を持っていますが、ハニーキングにそれはなんだと言うれると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He carries a letter, but when the Honey King asks what it is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とある可憐な女性からハニーキング様へのラブレターです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s a love letter to the Honey King from a certain lovely lady.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、渡すタイミングは連絡が来た時という事になっていますので、今は渡せません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the timing to deliver it is only when contact is made, so I cannot hand it over now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えー、みたいなぁ・・でも、そうか、残念　待つか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ehh, I want to see it... But I guess it’s too bad. I’ll wait...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、そのハニーが持っていたブザーが何か通信関係がなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, the buzzer the Honey had starts ringing—some sort of communication.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、連絡が来ました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, a message has arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、お渡ししろとの事です・・どうぞ、これを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say to give it now... Here, please take this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が道を進んでいると・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Rance and the others proceed down the road...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木に登って周囲を偵察していたかなみが報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami, who was scouting around from a tree, reports.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうに煙りが見える・・さっきの町の方角だわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see smoke over there... It’s in the direction of the town we just passed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知能試験の合格者が集められていた町か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The town where the successful candidates of the intelligence test were gathered...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何があった・・戻ってみよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happened... Let’s go back and check.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町に戻る・・燃えていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Returning to the town... it was on fire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が町を包囲するように現れ、住民を殺している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army appeared surrounding the town, killing the residents.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知能試験で集められた住人は、何故だ・・俺達は試験に合格したエリートなんだろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The residents gathered for the intelligence test—why? We are supposed to be elites who passed the exam.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達、魔軍の何か手伝いをさせる為に集められたのではないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Weren’t you gathered to be made to help the demon army somehow?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍ポル（ポルポトイメージ、ツォトンの側近）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon General Pol (modeled after Pol Pot, Tsoton’s aide)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 理由の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the reason

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンは人間共を家畜として管理する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton manages humans as livestock.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無闇には殺さない、労働力として必要だからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He doesn't kill them recklessly because he needs them as labor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、お前らのような頭のいい連中はいらない、インテリぶっていろいろ考え
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But he doesn’t need smart people like you, who act intellectual and overthink things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 支配者に逆らう事ばかりをする、だからお前らは集めて殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You always rebel against your rulers, so he gathers people like you to kill you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バカで従順な連中を残し、彼らを交配させバカな人間共をいっぱい作り支配する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He leaves behind stupid and obedient ones, breeds them to create lots of dumb humans and rules them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとかしこかった自分を怨むのだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should curse your own slight intelligence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と次々と殺されている所にランス達が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as they are being killed one after another, Rance and the others appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかポルを倒した、魔物兵は逃げて行ったが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow defeated Pol; the demon soldiers fled...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町は死体の山だった、数千人は集められていたはずだが・・生き残ったのは数百ぐらい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The town was a mountain of corpses; thousands had been gathered, but only a few hundred survived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むごい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cruel...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭のいい連中だけを殺して人間を家畜化するというのか・・むかつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They kill only the smart ones and turn humans into livestock... disgusting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、間違っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, that’s wrong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし間引く必要があるのなら、男とブスにしておけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If thinning out is necessary, then keep the men and ugly ones.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可愛い子はアホでも天才でも殺してはいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cute girls must never be killed, whether idiots or geniuses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとランス、こんな時に不真面目な事を言わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, Rance, don’t say joking things at a time like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・あっ、となるとウルザちゃんが危ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Ah, that means Urza-chan is in danger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそっ、どこだ、生きている魔物兵をとっつかまえて情報を吐かせるんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it, where are they? Catch a living demon soldier and make it spill information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが・・魔物大将軍ツォトンの居場所は分からなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... we couldn’t find the location of Demon General Tsoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・ううう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Uuuu...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イライラしているランス、シィルがなだめている・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An irritated Rance is being calmed down by Seeral...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと大丈夫ですよ、町の人が言っていだしゃないですか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It will surely be alright, didn’t the townspeople say so?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上級試験の合格者は魔軍司令部に連れていかれて、魔物大将軍ツォトンに謁見出来るとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who pass the advanced exam are taken to the demon army headquarters and can have an audience with Demon General Tsoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍の頭脳にされるのかとは思いますが、命は無事なはずです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think they might be made the mind of the demon general, but their lives should be safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや・・わからん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... I don't know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この作戦だが、ウルザちゃんに危険は少しあるのは覚悟していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About this operation, I was prepared for there to be some danger to Urza-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸に剥かれて魔物将軍の頭脳にされる為にカプセルに入れられちゃうかもとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe she’ll be stripped naked and put in a capsule to be turned into the demon general’s mind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、奴らの目的は頭のいい者の処刑
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, their goal is to execute the smart ones.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはやばい、殺されてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad, she might be killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに・・飛んでいるアニスにかかえられた千鶴子がやってくる、ウルザから連絡がきたわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then... Chizuko, carried by flying Anis, arrives. They've received contact from Urza.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女、計画通り、魔物大将軍ツォトンの元についたようよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She seems to have reached Demon General Tsoton as planned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 座標はＸＸＸ、ＸＸＸ　ＸＸＸのＸＸＸのあたりよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The coordinates are XXX, XXX, around XXX of XXX.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな数字言われてもわからん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you say numbers like that, I don’t understand.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Here, please take this."},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が道を進んでいると・・","translatedEnglishLine":"As Rance and the others proceed down the road..."},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"木に登って周囲を偵察していたかなみが報告","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami, who was scouting around from a tree, reports."},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"向こうに煙りが見える・・さっきの町の方角だわ","translatedEnglishLine":"I see smoke over there... It’s in the direction of the town we just passed."},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"知能試験の合格者が集められていた町か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The town where the successful candidates of the intelligence test were gathered..."},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"何があった・・戻ってみよう","translatedEnglishLine":"What happened... Let’s go back and check."},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"町に戻る・・燃えていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Returning to the town... it was on fire."},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍が町を包囲するように現れ、住民を殺している","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army appeared surrounding the town, killing the residents."},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"知能試験で集められた住人は、何故だ・・俺達は試験に合格したエリートなんだろ","translatedEnglishLine":"The residents gathered for the intelligence test—why? We are supposed to be elites who passed the exam."},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前達、魔軍の何か手伝いをさせる為に集められたのではないのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Weren’t you gathered to be made to help the demon army somehow?"},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍ポル（ポルポトイメージ、ツォトンの側近）","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon General Pol (modeled after Pol Pot, Tsoton’s aide)"},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"　理由の説明","translatedEnglishLine":"    Explanation of the reason"},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ツォトンは人間共を家畜として管理する","translatedEnglishLine":"Tsoton manages humans as livestock."},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無闇には殺さない、労働力として必要だからな","translatedEnglishLine":"He doesn't kill them recklessly because he needs them as labor."},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、お前らのような頭のいい連中はいらない、インテリぶっていろいろ考え","translatedEnglishLine":"But he doesn’t need smart people like you, who act intellectual and overthink things."},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"　支配者に逆らう事ばかりをする、だからお前らは集めて殺す","translatedEnglishLine":"You always rebel against your rulers, so he gathers people like you to kill you."},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バカで従順な連中を残し、彼らを交配させバカな人間共をいっぱい作り支配する","translatedEnglishLine":"He leaves behind stupid and obedient ones, breeds them to create lots of dumb humans and rules them."},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっとかしこかった自分を怨むのだな","translatedEnglishLine":"You should curse your own slight intelligence."},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"と次々と殺されている所にランス達が現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"Just as they are being killed one after another, Rance and the others appear."},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle"},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとかポルを倒した、魔物兵は逃げて行ったが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow defeated Pol; the demon soldiers fled..."},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"町は死体の山だった、数千人は集められていたはずだが・・生き残ったのは数百ぐらい","translatedEnglishLine":"The town was a mountain of corpses; thousands had been gathered, but only a few hundred survived."},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"むごい・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Cruel..."},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"頭のいい連中だけを殺して人間を家畜化するというのか・・むかつく","translatedEnglishLine":"They kill only the smart ones and turn humans into livestock... disgusting."},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"ああ、間違っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, that’s wrong."},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"もし間引く必要があるのなら、男とブスにしておけ","translatedEnglishLine":"If thinning out is necessary, then keep the men and ugly ones."},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"可愛い子はアホでも天才でも殺してはいけない","translatedEnglishLine":"Cute girls must never be killed, whether idiots or geniuses."},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょっとランス、こんな時に不真面目な事を言わない","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, Rance, don’t say joking things at a time like this."},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・あっ、となるとウルザちゃんが危ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"...Ah, that means Urza-chan is in danger."},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"くそっ、どこだ、生きている魔物兵をとっつかまえて情報を吐かせるんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Damn it, where are they? Catch a living demon soldier and make it spill information."},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが・・魔物大将軍ツォトンの居場所は分からなかった","translatedEnglishLine":"But... we couldn’t find the location of Demon General Tsoton."},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・ううう","translatedEnglishLine":"...Uuuu..."},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"イライラしているランス、シィルがなだめている・・","translatedEnglishLine":"An irritated Rance is being calmed down by Seeral..."},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"きっと大丈夫ですよ、町の人が言っていだしゃないですか","translatedEnglishLine":"It will surely be alright, didn’t the townspeople say so?"},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"上級試験の合格者は魔軍司令部に連れていかれて、魔物大将軍ツォトンに謁見出来るとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who pass the advanced exam are taken to the demon army headquarters and can have an audience with Demon General Tsoton."},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍の頭脳にされるのかとは思いますが、命は無事なはずです","translatedEnglishLine":"I think they might be made the mind of the demon general, but their lives should be safe."},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや・・わからん","translatedEnglishLine":"No... I don't know."},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"この作戦だが、ウルザちゃんに危険は少しあるのは覚悟していた","translatedEnglishLine":"About this operation, I was prepared for there to be some danger to Urza-chan."},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"裸に剥かれて魔物将軍の頭脳にされる為にカプセルに入れられちゃうかもとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe she’ll be stripped naked and put in a capsule to be turned into the demon general’s mind."},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、奴らの目的は頭のいい者の処刑","translatedEnglishLine":"However, their goal is to execute the smart ones."},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"これはやばい、殺されてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"This is bad, she might be killed."},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに・・飛んでいるアニスにかかえられた千鶴子がやってくる、ウルザから連絡がきたわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then... Chizuko, carried by flying Anis, arrives. They've received contact from Urza."},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼女、計画通り、魔物大将軍ツォトンの元についたようよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"She seems to have reached Demon General Tsoton as planned."},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"座標はＸＸＸ、ＸＸＸ　ＸＸＸのＸＸＸのあたりよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"The coordinates are XXX, XXX, around XXX of XXX."},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな数字言われてもわからん","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if you say numbers like that, I don’t understand."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦災孤児・・・可哀想、悲惨ー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: War orphans... So pitiful, tragic—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵に捕まった女騎士・・きゃーきゃー悲惨
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A female knight captured by the enemy... Eek eek, how tragic

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、捕虜にした女の子を拷問、拷問ー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then, torturing the captured girls, torturing—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやーん、許してーというのを剥く　ひでーひでーそれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nooo, please forgive me—stripping them off, that's terrible, just terrible

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命が欲しければスカート自分でめくってみなとか　ひでーよ、残酷ー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to live, lift up your own skirt or else—so cruel, so brutal

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ、戦争は楽しそうだ。我々も参加せねばな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, war sounds like fun. We must participate as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間の女の子を不幸にして不幸にして、それからちょっぴり救うのだー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make human girls unhappy and miserable, and then save them a little bit—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おー　おー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh— Oh—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニーキングの側にはハニーの氷溶の者がいます（ウルザの信奉者）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Beside the Honey King stands one of Honey’s Ice Melt followers (a devotee of Urza).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼は何か手紙を持っていますが、ハニーキングにそれはなんだと言うれると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He carries a letter, but when the Honey King asks what it is,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とある可憐な女性からハニーキング様へのラブレターです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s a love letter to the Honey King from a certain lovely lady.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも、渡すタイミングは連絡が来た時という事になっていますので、今は渡せません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the timing to deliver it is only when contact is made, so I cannot hand it over now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えー、みたいなぁ・・でも、そうか、残念　待つか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ehh, I want to see it... But I guess it’s too bad. I’ll wait...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、そのハニーが持っていたブザーが何か通信関係がなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, the buzzer the Honey had starts ringing—some sort of communication.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、連絡が来ました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, a message has arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、お渡ししろとの事です・・どうぞ、これを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say to give it now... Here, please take this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が道を進んでいると・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Rance and the others proceed down the road...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木に登って周囲を偵察していたかなみが報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami, who was scouting around from a tree, reports.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向こうに煙りが見える・・さっきの町の方角だわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see smoke over there... It’s in the direction of the town we just passed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知能試験の合格者が集められていた町か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The town where the successful candidates of the intelligence test were gathered...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何があった・・戻ってみよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What happened... Let’s go back and check.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町に戻る・・燃えていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Returning to the town... it was on fire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍が町を包囲するように現れ、住民を殺している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army appeared surrounding the town, killing the residents.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知能試験で集められた住人は、何故だ・・俺達は試験に合格したエリートなんだろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The residents gathered for the intelligence test—why? We are supposed to be elites who passed the exam.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達、魔軍の何か手伝いをさせる為に集められたのではないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Weren’t you gathered to be made to help the demon army somehow?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍ポル（ポルポトイメージ、ツォトンの側近）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon General Pol (modeled after Pol Pot, Tsoton’s aide)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 理由の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation of the reason

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ツォトンは人間共を家畜として管理する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tsoton manages humans as livestock.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無闇には殺さない、労働力として必要だからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He doesn't kill them recklessly because he needs them as labor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、お前らのような頭のいい連中はいらない、インテリぶっていろいろ考え
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But he doesn’t need smart people like you, who act intellectual and overthink things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 支配者に逆らう事ばかりをする、だからお前らは集めて殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You always rebel against your rulers, so he gathers people like you to kill you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バカで従順な連中を残し、彼らを交配させバカな人間共をいっぱい作り支配する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He leaves behind stupid and obedient ones, breeds them to create lots of dumb humans and rules them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとかしこかった自分を怨むのだな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You should curse your own slight intelligence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と次々と殺されている所にランス達が現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just as they are being killed one after another, Rance and the others appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとかポルを倒した、魔物兵は逃げて行ったが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somehow defeated Pol; the demon soldiers fled...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町は死体の山だった、数千人は集められていたはずだが・・生き残ったのは数百ぐらい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The town was a mountain of corpses; thousands had been gathered, but only a few hundred survived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むごい・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cruel...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭のいい連中だけを殺して人間を家畜化するというのか・・むかつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They kill only the smart ones and turn humans into livestock... disgusting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、間違っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, that’s wrong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし間引く必要があるのなら、男とブスにしておけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If thinning out is necessary, then keep the men and ugly ones.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可愛い子はアホでも天才でも殺してはいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cute girls must never be killed, whether idiots or geniuses.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとランス、こんな時に不真面目な事を言わない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, Rance, don’t say joking things at a time like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・あっ、となるとウルザちゃんが危ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Ah, that means Urza-chan is in danger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそっ、どこだ、生きている魔物兵をとっつかまえて情報を吐かせるんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn it, where are they? Catch a living demon soldier and make it spill information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが・・魔物大将軍ツォトンの居場所は分からなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But... we couldn’t find the location of Demon General Tsoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・・ううう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Uuuu...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イライラしているランス、シィルがなだめている・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An irritated Rance is being calmed down by Seeral...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと大丈夫ですよ、町の人が言っていだしゃないですか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It will surely be alright, didn’t the townspeople say so?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上級試験の合格者は魔軍司令部に連れていかれて、魔物大将軍ツォトンに謁見出来るとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who pass the advanced exam are taken to the demon army headquarters and can have an audience with Demon General Tsoton.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍の頭脳にされるのかとは思いますが、命は無事なはずです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think they might be made the mind of the demon general, but their lives should be safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや・・わからん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No... I don't know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この作戦だが、ウルザちゃんに危険は少しあるのは覚悟していた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About this operation, I was prepared for there to be some danger to Urza-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裸に剥かれて魔物将軍の頭脳にされる為にカプセルに入れられちゃうかもとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe she’ll be stripped naked and put in a capsule to be turned into the demon general’s mind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、奴らの目的は頭のいい者の処刑
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, their goal is to execute the smart ones.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはやばい、殺されてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad, she might be killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに・・飛んでいるアニスにかかえられた千鶴子がやってくる、ウルザから連絡がきたわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then... Chizuko, carried by flying Anis, arrives. They've received contact from Urza.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女、計画通り、魔物大将軍ツォトンの元についたようよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She seems to have reached Demon General Tsoton as planned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 座標はＸＸＸ、ＸＸＸ　ＸＸＸのＸＸＸのあたりよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The coordinates are XXX, XXX, around XXX of XXX.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな数字言われてもわからん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you say numbers like that, I don’t understand.
